TaskDescription.Detail: Open a new Excel file to add, delete, and select sheets.

Assist.value: You can designate a variable to contain the opened Excel file. Store in RESULT by default.
Click the Run button to open a new Excel file.
Specifies the sheet name. Input 'Sheet Brity'.
You can specify the position where the new worksheet will be created. If set to 1, it is created after the first sheet.
Click the Run button to create a new sheet.
Write a value in the area specified in the Excel file.
Specify the values ​​to be input as an array. Input this.data. (The variable is assigned a value to be Input.)
Input the cell address to start typing. Values ​​are Input from 'A1'.
Click the Run button to check the input value.
Specifies the sheet name to be copied. Input 'Sheet Brity'.
Specifies the sheet name to be pasted. Input 'Sheet Brity 2'.
Click the Run button to check the copied sheet.
Specifies the name of the sheet to be moved. Input 'Sheet Brity 2'
Specify the sheet name to be placed behind the moving target. Input 'Sheet1' to move it to the front.
Click the Run Test button to check the moving worksheet.
Input the sequence number of the worksheet to get the name from. Input 1 to get the first sheet name.
Specify the variable to save the sheet name. The first sheet name is assigned to RESULT.
Specifies the name of the sheet to be deleted. Input 'Sheet Brity 2'.
Click the Run button to confirm that the 'Sheet Brity 2' sheet is deleted.
Specifies the name of the sheet name. Input 'Sheet Brity' to select the sheet you created.
Click the Run button to check the selected sheet.
